name: Hangin' Around (Chazi b)
description:
IMPORTANT: SCROLL  THE GAME TO THE RIGHT TO SEE THE FULLSCREEN BUTTON IF IT'S NOT THERE.

Created for Mini Jam 111

All art, code, sound effects, and music were created within the 72 hours of the jam.

Game design and level design by Marcus Martin

Game design, code, art, and music by Chazi b

Left-click to select creatures, WASD/Arrow Keys to move, Q and E to rotate the crystal creatures.

Have fun!
